duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installations and changes of broadband services while adhering to safety guidelines and company procedures.
Update customer account to ensure accuracy of products and services and provide a positive customer experience.
Troubleshoot and resolve customer inquiries to ensure proper functioning of products and services.
Communicate and educate customers on products and services, demonstrating active listening and empathy.
Manipulate connectors, fasteners, and wires using technical tools and equipment.
Drive company vehicle in a safe manner, maintaining proper equipment for required duties.
Perform work in various environmental conditions and maintain regular, punctual attendance.
Complete required training, certifications, and safety requirements.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
